Articles.Content: I have the steam version of KSP. When I click "Play" it asks if I want KSP or KSP 32 bit. I distinctly remember in the pre-release there being an option for 64 bit. Where did it go?

49 minutes ago, SelectHalfling0 said:

I have the steam version of KSP. When I click "Play" it asks if I want KSP or KSP 32 bit. I distinctly remember in the pre-release there being an option for 64 bit. Where did it go?

Looking in Task Manager, the first option (non-32 bit) is called "KSP_x64" so...
You also see it in the main menu. If you just launch KSP it says in the bottom right in the main menu KSP 1.xxxx (x64)
Yeah. KSP is automatically KSP 64 bit. Thanks!
